content:
I'm glad you're excited to place your order!

Yes, Hanna Andersson does offer expedited shipping options to ensure your gift arrives on time. Here are their shipping options:

* **Standard Shipping:** 5-7 business days, $8 flat rate
* **Expedited Shipping:** 3-4 business days, $15 flat rate
* **Rush Shipping:** 2 business days, $25 flat rate
* **Same-Day Shipping:** Available for orders placed before 1 PM ET, $35 flat rate (only available for certain zip codes)

Please note that expedited shipping options may not be available for all products, and some items may have longer processing times.

If you need your gift to arrive quickly, I recommend choosing the Expedited Shipping or Rush Shipping option. You can select your preferred shipping method during checkout.

Also, don't forget to check the production time for your customized onesie and blanket set, as it may take a few days to process before shipping.

I'm glad to hear that your sister loved the silver necklace with a small pendant! It's always great to find a thoughtful gift that resonates with the recipient.

If you have any more questions or concerns, feel free to ask. Otherwise, happy shopping, and I hope your coworker loves the gift!
